Player History
Injured on 8/8/1966 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Drafted in 7th round, 121st overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1967...
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1972...
Earned first career win on 6/16/1976...
Injured on 4/30/1979 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/29/1982 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 7/24/1982 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 5/3/1983 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5-6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 4/1/1986 to a 1-year deal worth $372,000 per year...
Released by Baltimore on 4/26/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 4/26/1986 to a 1-year deal worth $540,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/3/1988 to a 2-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
